# ExportFormat enumeration

Specifies the format to use when exporting certificates.

```csharp
public enum ExportFormat
```

## Values

| name | value | description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Pfx | `0` | PFX/PKCS#12 format. |
| Pem | `1` | PEM format. |
